title: Taxonomy metadata
description: Accompanying metadata for a peer taxonomy file.

seed_examples.description: An array of metadata for the seed examples in the peer taxonomy file.

source.title: Attribution Source
source.description: If information in the context, question, or answer of a seed example come from a 3rd party, for example Wikipedia, then the value must specify a URL to the source material. If the contributor self-authored all the information, then the value must be 'self-authored'.

license.title: Attribution License
license.description: The value must specify the SPDX License Identifier, https://spdx.org/licenses/, of the source information. See CONTRIBUTING.MD for guidance on acceptable licenses for source information. If the information is self-authored, then 'Apache-2.0' must be used.
